quote: The F-35 fighter jet — I saved — I got involved in the negotiation. It's 2,500 jets. I negotiated for 90 planes, lot 10. I got $725 million off the price.
quotePlain: The F-35 fighter jet — I saved — I got involved in the negotiation. It’s 2,500 jets. I negotiated for 90 planes, lot 10. I got $725 million off the price.
name: Donald Trump

claims.title: Trump saved hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.negative: Trump didn't save hundreds of millions on F-35

claims.truth: Most of the cuts were already planned.
